Module org.example.taskmanager
Package model.toDoList

Interface TaskFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
TaskFactoryStd
public interface TaskFactory
A factory to instantiate tasks.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    BooleanTask
    createBooleanTask(Boolean isFinished, String description, Date deadline, Priority priority, int estimatedTime)
    createBooleanTask: instantiates a boolean task.
    ComplexTask
    createComplexTask(String description, Priority priority)
    createComplexTask: instantiates a complex task.
    ProgressiveTask
    createProgressiveTask(Double progress, String description, Date deadline, Priority priority, int estimatedTime)
    createProgressiveTask: instantiates a progressive task.

  • Method Details

    • createBooleanTask

      BooleanTask createBooleanTask(Boolean isFinished, String description, Date deadline, Priority priority, int estimatedTime)
      createBooleanTask: instantiates a boolean task.
      Parameters:
      isFinished - the state of the task
      description - the description of the task
      deadline - the end date of the task
      priority - the priority level of the task
      estimatedTime - the amount of days the task is going to take
      Returns:
      BooleanTask

    • createProgressiveTask

      ProgressiveTask createProgressiveTask(Double progress, String description, Date deadline, Priority priority, int estimatedTime)
      createProgressiveTask: instantiates a progressive task.
      Parameters:
      progress - the percentage completed of the task
      description - the description of the task
      deadline - the end date of the task
      priority - the priority level of the task
      estimatedTime - the amount of days the task is going to take
      Returns:
      ProgressiveTask

    • createComplexTask

      ComplexTask createComplexTask(String description, Priority priority)
      createComplexTask: instantiates a complex task.
      Parameters:
      description - the description of the task
      priority - the priority level of the task
      Returns:
      ComplexTask
